item.title: Leo XIV will ‘complete and complement [the U.S.] political agenda’: Cardinal Cupich
item.description: On "This Week," Cardinal Cupich said Pope Leo XIV may call for changes to the United States immigration system.

item.title: Puerto Rico seeks to lure manufacturing to boost economy as Trump tariff war deepens
item.description: A global trade war is offering Puerto Rico hope as the island attempts to strengthen its fragile economy
